org.jpac.plc
Class LobRxTx

java.lang.Object
  org.jpac.plc.LobRxTx
Direct Known Subclasses:
StringRxTx
public abstract class LobRxTx
extends java.lang.Object

Used to transfer a large data item between the java application and the plc or other device.
"Large" means, that the size of the data item exceeds the maximum pdu size,
which is the size of the chunk of data which can be transferred by a
single transaction.
To transfer, large data items are splitted into smaller chunks of date,
which then are transferred sequentially within multiple transactions.
CAUTION: During this transmission sequence, the data will be inconsistent on
the partcular receiving side (critical section). Make sure, that the software
of the receiving side waits until the transmission completed, before
processing the data

Constructor Detail

LobRxTx

public LobRxTx(Connection conn,
               Address address,
               int dataOffset,
               Data data)
        throws IndexOutOfRangeException
useful in situations, where the instance is part of complex data structure (STRUCT)

Parameters:
conn - an open TCP/IP connection to the plc or other device
db - the data block (DB) to be accessed
address - the address of the data item inside the plc or other device
dataOffset - the byte offset inside data, holding the data item to be exchanged with the plc or other device
data - instance of Data used to hold the data item exchanged with the plc or other device.
Throws:
IndexOutOfRangeException
